text: EMS/Taubaté/Fundação Universitária Vida Cristã, EMS Taubaté FUNVIC or simply Vôlei Taubaté, is a Brazilian professional volleyball team based in Taubaté, São Paulo, Brazil. They compete in the Brazilian Superliga. ==Achievements== *South American Club Championship *: 16px (x1) 2016 *Brazilian Superliga *: 16px (x1) 2018–19 *: 16px (x1) 2016–17 *: 16px (x2) 2014–15, 2015–16 * Brazilian Cup *: 16px (x2) 2015, 2017 ==Team== Squad as of October 2019 {| class="wikitable collapsible sortable" style="font-size:100%; text- align:center;" !
